content: Is there a way to get CC'd on any PR that involves a CI perf run? E.g. tell GitHub "CC me on any PR that has a comment containing Finished benchmarking commit" or something like that
Oh, every PR gets that after merging. Maybe the string would be something involving "@rust-timer", then
Maybe maybe modify the bot to ping a group?
@nnethercote Do you want to get pinged on every perf run, or every perf run that has any interesting results?
@Josh Triplett Not sure. Either would be fine as a starting point
I don't believe there currently is a way to do this. We could set a group if you would find that helpful.

We should hopefully have a feature soon that lets you watch all issues in a repo but only if they have a particular label, so that would let you presumably subscribe to waiting-on-perf as the label (or maybe perf-regression).
there are GH actions/bots that can notify people when a certain label is added to an issue (waiting-on-perf) like wasmtime uses: example
